data.eml:eml: Sonerila nairii (Melastomataceae) - a new species from the southern Western Ghats, India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Murugan, Soumya, Nair, Maya C. (2016): Sonerila nairii (Melastomataceae) - a new species from the southern Western Ghats, India. PhytoKeys 62: 15-23, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.62.7623, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.62.7623
